commit.message:
fixed several issues, mainly code style.

Added license header, changes unnecessary code and fixed some other small issues

nodes.bodyText: A single-line comment should be preceded by a blank line, see https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/codeconventions-comments.html#341
Constants should be all uppercase with words separated by underscores, see https://www.oracle.com/java/technologies/javase/codeconventions-namingconventions.html
testOrganisation is still not a constant

check to the constant messagePriority
goes for other tests as well

check to the constant scheduleTime
goes for other tests as well

commit.message:
Several code quality improvements to ConfigurationManagementServiceTest

Make some changes to improve code quality: renamed constants, make a variable constant. change a few checks to check the constant rather than a number and moved a few asserts to a seperate method since they are always checked together

nodes.bodyText:
The static field ConfigurationManagementServiceTest.OUT_CONTENT should be accessed in a static way.
So replace this.OUT_CONTENT with OUT_CONTENT
goes for all the occurences of this.OUT_CONTENT

commit.message:
Several more code quality fixes.

removed public for the class and tests, and removed 
the this before the static values.

One more code quality fix

another this removed, missed in the last commit

Removed reflection and improved some tests

with some changes the mock injection worked without injection. Two tests used (faulty) logger output in assertion, this was changed to check that specific methods were not called
